about_the_game:
A people's flow of text repair fairy hanging up game, only need to tap a few, and then hang up can have revenue

With just a few taps, you can master a variety of skills in the world of cultivating the immortal, such as: meditation cultivation, learning spells, cultivating spiritual pets, making sorcerers, refining herbal medicines, drawing talisman, making tactics, planting spiritual plants, collecting spiritual mines, and so on.

After you have mastered these skills, you can assist in cultivation through corresponding spells, sorceries, nostrums and other items

When you reach perfection in your cultivation, you need to exhaust all means in order to break through to the next level of cultivation until you ascend to the celestial realm

Game Features:

Easy to use game mechanics, as long as easy to hang up to grow

A strategic combat system that makes your combat experience extraordinary.

About 200 kinds of exercises, 120 kinds of tools, plus about 200 kinds of medicine, talisman, tools, so that you have a rich combat experience

More than 150 types of subduable grace allow you to form your team at will

With just a few taps, you can master a variety of skills in the world of cultivating the immortal, such as: meditation cultivation, learning spells, cultivating spiritual pets, making sorcerers, refining herbal medicines, drawing talisman, making tactics, planting spiritual plants, collecting spiritual mines, and so on.

After you have mastered these skills, you can assist in cultivation through corresponding spells, sorceries, nostrums and other items

When you reach perfection in your cultivation, you need to exhaust all means in order to break through to the next level of cultivation until you ascend to the celestial realm

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win7
  • Processor: intel-i3-3210
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: win10
  • Processor: intel-i5-12600
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
